response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. Considering its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are extending a special offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $1,000,000. This price not only reflects the true value of the product but also provides you with a substantial savings compared to its market value. We understand that such an investment is not to be taken lightly, and we are committed to ensuring a seamless transaction. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for immediate delivery and all necessary documentation.", "product_price": 1000000}
